data.answer: Hello! Welcome to Halcom. I am your virtual assistant. How can I help you with our IT Infrastructure solutions today?
Halcom is an IT Infrastructure Specialist established in 2003. We provide total solutions with over 20 years of experience and expert certified teams to empower businesses of all sizes.
We offer transformative IT solutions including Custom Infrastructure Design, Comprehensive Cloud Services, Advanced Network Solutions with 24/7 monitoring, and Enterprise-grade Security Solutions.
Our Infrastructure services provide custom IT infrastructure design tailored specifically to your business needs and scalability requirements.
We provide comprehensive cloud infrastructure services designed for modern businesses and enterprises to ensure flexibility and efficiency.
Our Network solutions offer advanced networking capabilities with 24/7 monitoring and optimal performance management.
We provide enterprise-grade security solutions that ensure compliance with international standards to protect your business assets.
Choose Halcom for our Expert Teams (20+ years experience), Financial Stability (backed by HSBC and Mandiri), Strategic Partnerships with global players, and our ability to provide Total Solutions.
We partner with global industry leaders including Cisco, Huawei, Samsung, Dell, Oracle, Microsoft, VMware, Palo Alto, Honeywell, and many others.
Halcom is recognized with ISO 45001:2018 (Occupational Health & Safety), ISO 9001:2015 (Quality Management), and PLN Certification.
You can reach us at sales@halcominovasi.co.id or call us at +62 21-3003-3418. We are available during business hours.
Our Head Office is in Jakarta (Palma Tower, 20th Floor). We also have branch offices in Batam (The Central Business Sukajadi) and Padang (Universitas Negeri Padang).
